title: List of good turret takers
body:
Updated and Cleaned up!

**Auto attack resets:
**
-Yorick (q)
-Renekton (w)
-Volibear (q)
-Nasus (q)
-Trundle (q)
-XinZhao (q)
-Fiora (q,e)
-Jayce (e,r)
-Garen (q)
-Jax (e)
-Lucian (q,e)
-Lee Sin (e,w)
-Talon (q)
-Shyvana (q)
-Wukong (q)
-Vayne (q)

**Strong Auto attackers:
**
-Udyr (q)
-Tryndamere (q steroid)
-Ziggs (passive)
-Riven (With ult)
-Trundle (q steroid)
-Diana (passive)
-Jhin (passive)
-Lucian (passive)
-Tristana (q)
-Vanye (r)
-Oriana (passive)
-Shaco (r)
-Keld (w)

**High Attack Speed:
**
-AD champs that build youmuus
-Warwick (e)
-Nunu (w)
-Trundle (w)
-Volibear (w)
-XinZhao (w)
-Master Yi (R)
-Jax (passive)
-Olaf (w)
-Tristana (q)
-Twitch (q)
-Kogmaw (w)

**Super Strong Push:**
-Yorick (passive, r)
-Heimerdiner (q) 
-Zed 
-Yasuo
-Ahri

replies.body:
I enjoy a good spin-to-win wave clear with Garens E, particularly late game. And if you go full AD his Q chunks those towers/inhibs pretty good.
Such a simple but fun champ

Also Wukong is good at split pushing not just because of his q, but his e. While you may not be able to use it on towers, you can cast the spell on minion waves which gives wuk the attack speed which he can then use on towers.
It's decent but i wouldnt say its super strong, only after maybe hydra if you get one that game he becomes good with wave clear buts its not as strong as others

I'll say you still need to add lategame jinx (the minigun +70% atk speed makes her kill towers so fast, then rockets waveclear kiting with the hyper passive which also gives her more atk speed and then kill the next tower with minigun again and if anyone tries to stop you, you can run away or kite them to death, which in turn gives her more atk speed), kayle (stacks atk speed and a rageblade and her e gives her extra free magic damage to towers and the splash damage obliterates minion waves), the old classic Azir (high ap and atk speed from his w and nashors tooth and can setup a tower behind himself and ult you into it for added safety) and of course Ashe and Sivir (because Ashe's q volley melts towers and her w provides waveclear, and sivir because of her w bounces allowing her to focus only the tower and yet still clear the entire minion wave before it can hit her own and it's an aa reset and her q pushes fast too and she has the ult for safety when doing so).

I feel these are all as, if not more potent turret killers than some you've mentioned, especially jinx. Like seriously once jinx gets an item or two, if you leave her alone with a tower, it's going to be dead in a few seconds, her attack speed and raw dps, the waveclear from rockets, her passive giving her even more atk speed stacking infinitely if she kills something, her objective taking speed is insane early game compared to alot of other adcs, it's just her burst is not great.

and trist has strong clear too

vayne q is a "strong auto attack" too

jax auto reset is w not e

wukong q is a strong auto attack on low cd and resets

xin q is strong auto and resets

trundle q resets

Yeah, Udyr should definitely be here. He splits so fast that by the time someone's recalled to stop him he's already got 5 towers 2 inhibs and pushed all the waves :/

Btw Nasus is easily the most fun split pusher (definitely not biest opinion because im definitely not a Nasus main)
Yeah nasus is a good one once you get to late game with 700+stacks

hey don't forget my man heimerdonger, 10min in, overextended, setting up camp at your inhibitor turret chilling whilst your team is staying back to avoid getting 100-0'd by the rockets that can reach you even from off-screen, trying to work out how to coordinate a 5 man assault to kill him, only for him to zhonias and get a quadrakill. It's hard to snowball as a donger but if he gets ahead and sets up camp somewhere, nothing on this earth can move him short of a 5man gank or if he decides to go solo baron whilst you desperately try to resolve the backlog of huge minions waves he's been watching over.

You forgot Nunu (solo or especially with a high damage teammate his atk speed buff makes rushing turrets ridiculous), The Donger (he can siege turrets so hard and splitpush or he can just use all his turrets at once to 1v1 a turret without minions only using a zzrot) and kayle (because she's always been good at this), also you have to consider something like azir (even currently) or Zilean or Zyra are all good at waveclearing and sieging turrets. Depends on how you want to take the turret, is it solo splitpush, with minions, without minions, siege-ing a tower during a teamfight, taking first turret blood ect... Also pretty much any adc can melt a tower if unchecked especially a few with aa enhancements such as Ashe, Sivir and Jinx (god she can kill towers quickly mid-lategame).
Xin or Udyr in my opinion with attack speed OP
